tool.name: RandomODCMPermutations

param.name: analysis_type
param.dialogReference:
Type of analysis being conducted.

Currently the tool supports the following analysis types:

Global: Creates the OD Cost Matrix based on one set of points (source to source points)

Cross: Creates the OD Cost Matrix based on two set of points (source to destination points)

param.name: srcPoints
param.displayname: Input Origin Points Feature Dataset (e.g. bridges)

param.name: destPoints
param.displayname: Input Destination Points Feature Dataset (e.g. crashes)
param.dialogReference:
Input Destination Points Feature Dataset (e.g. crashes).

Will be the same as the the source points for Global Analysis if none are provided.

param.name: network_dataset
param.dialogReference: The network dataset used to calculate the OD Cost Matrix

param.name: snap_distance
param.dialogReference: Snapping distance of the points onto the dataset. It will be snapped to the nearest line if it is within this threshold.

param.name: cutoff_distance
param.dialogReference: Cutoff distance from the origin points in units of the projected dataset

param.name: output_raw_feature_class
param.displayname: Output Feature Class Name (Raw ODCM Data)
param.dialogReference: Output of the Raw ODCM Data as a feature class.

param.name: num_permutations
param.expression: 0 Permutations (No Confidence Envelope) | 9 Permutations | 99 Permutations | 999 Permutations
param.dialogReference: Number of random point permutations to use to generate the confidence envelope.

param.name: coordinate_system
param.displayname: Output Network Dataset Length Projected Coordinate System
param.dialogReference: Output network dataset length projected coordinate system

param.name: num_points_field
param.dialogReference: Name of a field in the network dataset's edge source from which the number of random points should be derived.

tool.summary:
Generates OD Cost Matrices with oberved data and a complementrary set of random point permutations.

The tool can take a long time to run based on the number of permutations the tool is set to run for.
tool.usage:
Before using, a requirement is that the user needs to know which type of analysis to do Global K-Function vs. Cross K-Function Analysis.

See parameters for description of Required and Optional inputs.

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Generates OD Cost Matrices with oberved data and a complementrary set of random point permutations.

The tool can take a long time to run based on the number of permutations the tool is set to run for.
